```{r echo=FALSE}
hour = as.numeric(format(Sys.time(), "%H"))

if (hour < 5){
  string = "Hello"
} else if (hour < 12){
  string = "Good Morning"
} else if(hour < 17){
  string = "Good Afternoon"
} else {
  string = "Good Evening"
}
```
